allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add fixed database migrations for provider schedules and integration support

Fixed Migration Issues:
- Removed problematic GIST overlap constraint that required btree_gist extension
- Added IF NOT EXISTS checks to prevent errors on re-run
- Added proper error handling for missing tables
- Added ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING for idempotent inserts

Migration 004 (Provider Schedules):
- Creates provider_schedules table with all necessary fields
- Seeds Dr. Sarah Jones with schedules at 3 lab locations
- Includes staff assignments, hours, and location details
- Safe to run multiple times

Migration 005 (Integration Support):
- Adds integration fields to provider_schedules table
- Creates integration_credentials table for OAuth tokens
- Creates sync_log table for audit trail
- Validates provider_schedules exists before proceeding
- Handles constraint additions gracefully

Database Status:
- Both migrations tested and verified working in Supabase
- Provider availability management UI now has real data
- AI scheduling can use actual provider schedules
- Integration architecture fully supported in database

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
